thread.title: Gisele Bundchen had an epic Super Bowl celebration | New York Post
thread.title_full: Gisele Bundchen had an epic Super Bowl celebration | New York Post

author: Justin Terranova
title: Gisele Bundchen had an epic Super Bowl celebration | New York Post
text:
Copy 
This is a Super Bowl video Gisele Bundchen can be proud of. 
Five years ago the supermodel stunningly ripped Wes Welker and the Patriots receivers for letting down her husband, Tom Brady, in a Super Bowl loss to the Giants. On Sunday, though, any postgame shrieking she did was in pure joy. 
Fox cameras caught Bundchen in the moments after the Patriots’ shocking 34-28 victory was complete. The Brazilian was seen screaming into her phone while recording it then briefly fumbling it after her celebration was complete. 
She has yet to upload the video to her social media feeds, but we await patiently. Gisele celebrates by spiking her phone. #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/ttMMA81HfX 
— the makers market (@MMinTuscaloosa) February 6, 2017 Share this:
